description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Tank Attack 2D is a top down 2D shooter where the player must drive their tank and kill as many enemy tanks as possible. Take advantage of power ups that spawn such as rapid fire, a four-way laser attack, plasma ball rounds that can bounce of the game boundaries and kill multiple enemies and smart bombs. Watch out for the mega boss tanks!
description.short: Tank Attack 2D is a top down 2D shooter where the player must drive their tank and kill as many enemy tanks as possible.
